tool_description: African Heritage is a JSON RESTful API that serves unique African proverbs
title: African Heritage

api_list.name: Adage of the Day
api_list.description: Returns a randomly generated adage which is only regenerated every day at the 23rd hour
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://african-heritage.p.rapidapi.com/adage/aod"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "african-heritage.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get random adage
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://african-heritage.p.rapidapi.com/adage"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "african-heritage.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
